body: ### Welcome to Heart Observe Easily track your blood pressure and pulse on your Android™ device. ## Donation Heart Observe is a donation supported app. Our policy is to not include ads. If you find Heart Observe useful and you want to support its' continued development, please donate. One way to donate is to purchase our Donation app. ## Support or Contact Having trouble with Heart Observe? Got suggestions for improving it? Contact the developer @daryldy.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Heart Observe
